About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a student at University of Louisiana Monroe and I am majoring in Computer Science. I am looking for opportunities to show my knowledge of computers and coding to get ahead of the curve and have the upperhand in everything that I do.

Wesley Foundation

House Manager

I work and live at the Welsey Foundation at ULM. I clean, do yard work, and help/lead outreach programs that the students at the wesley participate in.

St Paul's UMC

Youth Leader and Videographer

I lead the Audio Visual crew at St Paul's when they have their VBS every summer. I also led their youth band for 5 years and continue to help or fill in whenever I can.
